name: nananana
description:
u can click arrows to tab thru bodies/faces

i wasn't able to do this but, todos:

- rename the banana 

- save a photo of ur banana! w caption

- rig  bananas to move idly

- more bananas....

- introductory blurb

-gdd: tbh i had a huge game planned but i wouldn't have time to do it... the premise is that a racoon stole ur head and u needed to catch it but if u bump into things u switch bodies/faces to varying and comedic effect.... you really want to end on original face/body tho.
